title: 03 Conferences
name: 03 Conferences
description: My CV plotted on a global map. My work has taken me to different parts of the world.

properties.name: Consultant
properties.description:
Organization: Self Employed

properties.name: Consultant - Business Software Systems
properties.description:
Organization: Symphony (System Integration Limited) 
Info: I started working for Symphony who were the parent company of Impact Consultants - and I was the first employee at the Software projects division of the Company. We did amazing work in the East African region with limited resources. 
Where: Waiyaki Way, Nairobi, Kenya
Category: WORK
Date from: 
Date to:

properties.name: Consulting Systems Engineer
